data.name: changelogTextBox.Text
data.value:
## Version 1.1.1.1
- Re-added: a better (further away) camera - Removed: dxgi.dll because it's not needed for SXVKL anymore and it causes problems for some users
## Version 1.1.1.0
- Added: new keybinding schemes that were added in the last Definitive Edition update
## Version 1.1.0.1
- Added: a real 4k resolution - 3840x2160 - Fixed: a ThemedDialogBox that pops-up when anuser is prompted to update anything - Fixed: a bug with window resizing
## Version 1.1.0.0
- Added: an Experimental section with new (and old) features! - Added: an ability to start a game in Exclusive Fullscreen from Experimentsl - Re-added: the ability to start any of the expansions from Experimental - Fixed: an ability to create and delete profiles. It became broken after few last DE patches. - Moved: -noprecache and Mod Merger to Experimental - Retargeted: Modlist to autoupdaes from the "main" branch instead of "DE". What it does is that I could have just one place top update the Modlist - Removed: isFileBlocked() method because it is never used anymore - Code refactoring
Full changelog: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/IgorTheLight/DoW-Mod-Manager/DE/changelog.txt
